about_the_game:
[Introduction to the game]


-------
You will play a hero who saves the village!
Your task is to save all the creatures in this land!
Bring them together and peace
Lead them to rebuild their new homes!
------
Relevant play methods
On the way to save them, you will encounter countless difficulties and dangers. You must keep learning and growing to strengthen yourself

Fight: Learn powerful spells to protect yourself.
Build a new home for the village name.
Planting: In order to survive, you must plant various foods to supplement yourself
Breeding: fishing, animal husbandry.
and more
---

Streamlight dream
In the dream, you will enjoy the beauty of different dreams and experience the danger of not being able to dream
----
Note: Depending on the computer hardware, you may need to wait for 10s-120s when entering the game. Please wait quietly for the game to load

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes the nudity of the character's body, as well as exposed clothing, breast shakes, hip shakes and other body physical effects.

name: The Dreamland：Free

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10 64bit
  • Processor: INTEL CORE i5-7400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 6 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10 64bit
  • Processor: INTEL CORE i5-12400F
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE RTX 3060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

short_description: This is a role-playing game, which mainly focuses on casual gameplay, such as construction, farming, fishing, and farming, and integrates a variety of combat elements and systems.
